backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with access-controlled user profiles, video storage, likes, comments, reactions, and follow relationships.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping navigation bar layout fixes to affected files and components with confidence flags.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files describing their roles in layout, navigation, auth, video feed, and creation workflow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App entry configuring TanStack Router routes with AppShell, pages, theme provider, and toaster.
Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gate component that blocks access when unauthenticated and shows a login prompt or fallback.
frontend/src/components/create/CameraRec: Camera recorder using MediaRecorder and custom camera hook to capture video or fall back to upload.
frontend/src/components/create/CaptureOr: Handles capturing video, photos, text-to-image rendering, or uploading files and passes the resulting File to the next step.
frontend/src/components/create/CreationF: Manages the multi-step creation workflow including mode selection, capture, editing, and preview.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/Du: Displays a duet layout with the source video and user's video side-by-side.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/Ed: Renders the media preview with applied editor state including speed, captions, and stickers.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/to: Generates auto-cut segments based on duration and sensitivity threshold. Updates editor state with generated segment list.
Adds, removes, and edits caption text and size within the editor state. Provides UI for managing multiple caption entries.
Allows selecting a single visual effect and updates the editor’s effects array. Uses buttons to toggle the active effect.
Provides filter selection with a single active filter at a time. Updates the editor’s filters array accordingly.
Handles upload and removal of a background image for green screen replacement. Updates editor state with background URL and settings.
Manages music selection, upload, and audio volume mixing for original and added tracks. Updates editor state with music settings.
Lets users pick a playback speed and updates the editor’s speed value. Displays preset speed options.
Enables adding stickers from packs and removing existing ones. Updates editor state with sticker objects and their properties.
Provides trim-range sliders to set start and end times. Updates editor trim values based on slider input.
Allows recording, clearing, and applying effects to a voiceover, updating editor state accordingly.
frontend/src/components/create/editor/To: Main tool panel that displays available editing tools and renders the active tool’s UI. Filters tools based on mode and manages tool selection state.
frontend/src/components/create/EditorSte: Provides the editing interface, manages editor state, and renders the final media before preview.
frontend/src/components/create/ModeSelec: UI for selecting creation mode: video, photo, or text.
frontend/src/components/create/PreviewSt: Shows a preview of the rendered output and handles publishing with title and caption input.
frontend/src/components/create/UploadFal: Drag-and-drop or click-to-upload component for selecting a video file.
frontend/src/components/create/VideoPrev: Simple video preview component that reloads when the source URL changes.
frontend/src/components/feed/VerticalVid: Renders a vertically scrollable video feed and tracks which video is active using an IntersectionObserver.
Defines the main app layout with header, tab bar, footer, and content container.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar with tab buttons that navigate between routes.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Shows a modal for profile editing with placeholder UI for future customization features.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users to enter a display name and saves it via API.
frontend/src/components/video/CommentsMo: Modal for viewing and posting comments on a video, showing comment list and input form.
frontend/src/components/video/Interactio: Provides like, comment, react, follow, share, and duet actions for a video with related modals.
frontend/src/components/video/ShareModal: Modal for sharing a video, supporting Web Share and clipboard copy with toast feedback.
Displays a video with autoplay, double‑tap like interaction, and optional interaction bar.
frontend/src/components/video/VideoPoste: Shows a placeholder poster and loading state while a video loads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDoubleTap.ts: Provides a handler to detect double‑tap gestures within a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, login flow, and related state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for videos, profiles, comments, reactions, and uploads using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode, and layout utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Create page gating access by authentication and launching the video creation flow with optional duet support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page fetching and displaying videos with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Static notifications page showing a placeholder UI and including the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's profile, follower stats, and video list with edit modals and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/TrendingPage.tsx: Fetches and shows trending videos with ranking badges, plus loading and error handling.
Analyzes audio by sampling amplitude over time and returns an array of volume values.
frontend/src/utils/editor/audioMixing.ts: Combines video audio with music and voiceover tracks, applying volume and effects using OfflineAudioContext.
frontend/src/utils/editor/renderPipeline: Renders edited video frames to a canvas, applies filters/effects, mixes audio, and outputs a final webm file.
frontend/src/utils/editor/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for editor filters, effects, captions, stickers, audio settings, and overall editor state.
frontend/src/utils/editor/videoProcessin: Applies pixel-level filters and visual effects to video frames on a canvas.
frontend/src/utils/editor/voiceEffects.t: Applies chipmunk, deep, or robotic voice effects to an AudioBuffer via OfflineAudioContext.
frontend/src/utils/haptics.ts: Triggers vibration feedback with configurable intensity.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Generates share URLs and shares videos via Web Share API or clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them from sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including issues, existing features, and metadata for build planning.
